# Core Rule 3 - No Hate Speech or Discriminatory Language This is a zero tolerance rule.
Even if you can reclaim a specific slur, this is not the place, and admins are not expected to maintain a registery of everyone and what they can reclaim.
This rule prohibits all the following: - Hate Speech - Slurs (including variations of slurs, racial, sexual, disability-related, or language closely tied to real-life slurs) - Bigotry - Racism - Sexism
## Examples Allowed: - Telling someone that you are gay.
Prohibited: - Calling someone gay in a context where gay is used as an insult or negative attribute. - Using a slur or variant even in a positive context. - Using the word "retard" in any context.
